name: iPhone
info: Revolutionized smartphones. 2 MP camera. Multi-touch interface. Paved the way for modern smartphones.

name: iPhone 3GS
info: Faster performance. Voice Control feature. 3 MP camera with video recording. Improved battery.

name: iPhone 4
info: Retina display. Front-facing camera. Stainless steel band. First iPhone with Facetime.

name: iPhone 5
info: Taller 4-inch display. Lightning connector. Slimmer and lighter design. Improved performance.

name: iPhone 6
info: Larger displays. Sleeker design. A8 chip. Improved camera. NFC for Apple Pay.

name: iPhone 7
info: Water and dust resistant. Stereo speakers. Dual-camera system. No headphone jack.

name: iPhone 8
info: Glass back for wireless charging. A11 Bionic chip. Augmented reality capabilities.

name: iPhone X
info: Face ID. Edge-to-edge OLED display. Dual cameras with portrait mode. Animoji.

name: iPhone 11
info: Dual-camera system. Night mode. A13 Bionic chip. Liquid Retina display.

name: iPhone 12
info: 5G capable. A14 Bionic chip. Ceramic Shield. MagSafe. Night mode.

name: iPhone 13
info: A15 Bionic chip. Cinematic mode. Improved battery life. ProMotion display. 5G.

name: iPhone 14
info: Advanced camera system. Faster performance. Longer battery life. Enhanced durability.

name: iPhone 15
info: Revolutionary design. AI integration. Ultrafast connectivity. Advanced AR capabilities. Enhanced security.
